title: Excellent resort
text: My wife and I just returned from an amazing weekend spent at Columbia Beach Resort. Amazing surroundings, a hotel that blends perfectly with the environment. Every part of our sparkling clean. Very professional and smiling staff. Excellent breakfast with a large variety of food. Our junior suite overlooking the pool was simply amazing. I’m trying very hard to find something to criticize but can’t. We will definitely return.

title: Disappointed
text: The restaurant was below bar during our stay in the hotel over the weekend. The cuisine was overwhelmed by last moment bookings. A hotel restaurant in a small village with only perhaps a couple of other restaurants that most probably close at 7pm due to covid measures should have take extra measures to accommodate all hotel guest for diner on time. The food was okay but I’m sure they can do better.

title: Very good with flaws
text:
Loved the idea of turning several village houses into a small and cosy hotel. That means you may have to walk a bit or even climb some stairs to get into your room but for me this was no problem. Very good and clean facilities. Nice and cosy room with a small fireplace. Just love that!! Pet friendly! Another plus of this hotel. Unimpressive breakfast, come on you can do better than that. Even promote Cyprus breakfast to match the village image of the hotel. Spa facilities were nice clean and somewhat expensive. Not to mention that you better book in advance, even before you arrive to the hotel. The only major disappointment was the hotel restaurant. It looks that last night the cuisine was
overwhelmed with last minute bookings and it took them 1.5 hours to serve our main dish. Marios the head of the restaurant apologized to us for the delay and even filled out our glasses of wine complimentary of the restaurant which was a nice gesture but they still need to find a way to solve this problem as from what I understand the hotel is fully booked every weekend!! They can simply drop the a la cart menu and offer buffet if they can’t handle the pressure. Lastly but not least, both my wife and I were quite happy with the staff. Very polite and helpful. Would definitely recommend this place for a short peaceful stay despite the few shortcomings.

title: One of our favorite Chinese
text: One of our favorite Chinese restaurants in Nicosia. Very good food reasonably priced and with excellent service. If not eating in the restaurant then we order online through Foody.

title: Well done guys
text: One of the few places that one would want to return for excellent food reasonably priced and friendly and attentive owner. One of the reasons I bring my guest here every time I host, I know they won’t be disappointed!

title: And visited again
text: Last time I’ve been here was in September. Last night visited the place for dinner. Still a good restaurant reasonably priced to visit especially this time of the year when most establishments close for winter

title: Good food but rather expensive
text: Good food but rather expensive at €20 each for the meze. You get full with the large number of plates but something was missing tasty-wise from some of the plates and others were pretty good. Would I visit again? Probably yes since I haven’t found a really nice place to eat in Kakopetria yet

title: One of the best
text: One of the best monasteries on Troodos mountain. Stunning views, peaceful and so clean. Definitely worth a visit

title: Great food great prices
text: Really great food at great prices something you don’t see very often in Cyprus. Highly recommended. Excellent location, fast service

title: Fantastic.
text: This is the first time ever I write a review before leaving the establishment. But I feel they deserve it. Take the staff. Excellent. Very professional, very polite and smiling all the time. Plus they speak Greek! Sorry but I’m my country I want to speak my language. Facilities. Excellent and clean. Location. Excellent, overlooking a nice beach. Room. The sea view is amazing. Greeted with a champagne and a plate with fruits. Something that I have seen only in five star hotels i visited. Breakfast one of the best and they serve fresh juices!! All these at a fraction of the cost five star hotels charge us in Cyprus. A very big well done to the owners and their team

title: Good restaurant in the heart
text: Good restaurant in the heart of Protaras. My pork chop was good although slightly dry. My wife’s kalamari was not cooked well so she returned it back. To their credit, they apologized and offered to replace it with another plate but as we already had a salad as a starter, she was full and politely refused. The kalamari was taken off the bill and offered to us a complimentary desert which again refused as this time I was full as well . I give them high marks with the way they handled the kalamari case and as these things do happen would definitely give them a second chance next time we are in Protaras.

title: Review of their royal suite
text:
My wife and I were celebrating our 29th wedding anniversary last weekend so we decided to book the royal suite for 3 nights. Despite a few mishaps, we had an excellent time.

Location of the hotel is just perfect. It sits just a few meters away from one of the best beaches in Cyprus. The royal suite virtually a few steps away from the golden sand! Truly amazing.

The room itself is very nicely decorated and is set apart from the rest of the hotel. This is simply 5 star accommodation annexed to a four star hotel. A few delays in cleaning our room were dealt with in a very professional way by the General Manager of the hotel. My advise to them as a seasoned traveler is to specially train a couple of persons to look after the suite. A five star accommodation requires well trained staff for it.

Breakfast was very good with great variety of foods, dairy products and fruits. I’m rather disappointed with the lack of fresh juices and of the machine made coffees, another reminder that this is after all a four star hotel.

Large swimming pool for tourists and people who can’t really appreciate the crystal clear blue sea just a few steps away.

Hotel is clean and you can see disinfectants in key positions due to the Covid pandemic. Unfortunately, a great deal of people were not wearing any masks inside the elevator. Hotel should take steps to change this. You only need 1 Covid case to shut it down ‍️

Small parking place is a minus for the hotel although it doesn’t really affect overseas tourists.

Would I recommend the royal suite? For a normal luxurious stay with stunning views absolutely yes. For a special celebration that requires five star service I wouldn’t. Unless they decide to go this extra mile to offer it!

title: Very good Italian food
text: Nice Italian restaurant centrally located in Protaras. Quick service. Carbonara was very good, the risotto was ok. Prices not bad for such an establishment. Would visit again.

title: Simple place great food
text: Simple place with an exceptionally likable owner! The meze for two was very good although at my age not easily digested at night. Prices are very good for cyprus. We will definitely eat there again next time we visit Protaras.

title: Good value
text: Very good hotel that was recently renovated. Clean spaces everywhere in the hotel including the room. COVID-19 conscious hotel, staff asking you to wear gloves in breakfast which earned good marks from me. Very good breakfast, great variety that you don’t usually find on a four star hotel. Very fast WiFi. My only negative remark is that WiFi is open. In an era where everything is done on smartphones including a lot of banking, open unsecured WiFi is a red flag! Is shows gross disrespect on your clients. I will have second thoughts returning to this hotel for more than one night stay.

title: Excellent hotel
text: Spent the weekend there with my wife. Room was clean, nice breakfast, excellent view from hotel’s swimming pool. Fast WiFi. All that at a very reasonable price for a sea view room! The receptionist told me I should visit their restaurant because it was very good. Unfortunately I didn’t listen to him and instead went out for burned dinner!! In two weeks time my wife and I will be celebrating our 29 wedding anniversary and I will book us again on this hotel. And will have dinner in this time!

title: Never again
text: One or two years ago I wrote a good review about this place. This year they burned my chicken souvlaki and the baycon in my wife’s hamburger. To be fair to them, the waiter asked me if I wanted to return my plate but I declined because I was hungry and didn’t want to wait for another 15 minutes for a new plate. When I asked for the bill, the waiter asked me how was our food. I told him burned. He told me he would inform the chef. No one came to apologize. This is the least I expected. I paid and left. They won’t be seeing me again.

title: Pretty good place
text: One of the best ofto I’ve eaten. The food is reasonably priced and there is plenty of space outside. Best to reserve before going

title: Nice shopping mall
text: Nice place to go shopping with all major brands located in one place. A big selection of restaurants and fast food. Tends to be pretty noisy on weekends.

title: Stunning views not bad at all
text: Service was pretty fast, the food was very good and with stunning views of the city from high above. Not bad at all

title: this review is not about the
text: this review is not about the ice cream. Is about their service. It sucks. Having to wait for 20 minutes for one of their waitresses to take notice of us is a joke. Other than that the quality of the ice cream is excellent but we will not be returning.

title: Becoming a joke
text:
Wao what a drop since my last review of this place. The food is still good and reasonable prices but the service has dropped dramatically. Asked for a fruit juice 3-4 times to get it! On the last time the waiter joked about it telling us something they are still picking the fruits from the tree!
Seriously ?

title: Still happy with this
text: Still consider this an excellent choice for a few days stop over in Athens. I think this is my fourth or fifth time staying in this hotel while in Athens. Pluses proximity to metro station and Syntagma square, cleanliness and excellent bedding and pillows!! Looking forward to my next Athens visit

title: Good choice
text: Very good restaurant in the heart of Athens, just a few meters away from Syntagma square. Serves amongst others Greek cuisine, waiters are polite and smiling , nothing exceptional but on the other hand a good choice for good food at reasonable prices.

title: Disappointed
text: The quality of the coffees and sweets was very good. Even the prices are ok for Cyprus. Decor excellent. But the average rating has to do with the staff. They have to be polite at all times and not show their frustration to the customer if a misunderstanding takes place. If they cannot handle their nerves then they should work in a factory handling machines.

title: Used to be better.
text: Used to be better. Now it looks like some tired old people are running this place. The halloumi was cooked on the one side only. Chips had this brownish color just making me wonder how many times they used the same cooking oil. The only reason I visited this restaurant this time was because I had a visitor from abroad and wanted her to taste local cuisine! At best mediocre

title: Slightly less than average
text: Slightly less than average fish tavern in the popular zygi area. How wrong can anyone go with the salad? Very if you don’t put the right portion of oil and vinegar which was the case today. Red mallet one of the tastier fish was completely tasteless. Same with fangri didn’t taste like fish. Don’t think I’ll visit again

title: Not bad
text: Nice ambience although slightly cold where our table was situated. The food was good, nothing extraordinary but good. Prices average for Cyprus.

title: It’s cold out there!
text: We were a group of ten people having lunch. The food was good, prices average we are in Cyprus after all where eating out is not particularly cheap. My complain is that the place was pretty cold despite the fireplace being lit. You expect people in your restaurant the least you can do it keep it warm.

title: Just loved it
text: Been in this place for my company’s Christmas party. Food was excellent. Desert the same. Place was alive and I really enjoyed the 80s music!! Since I didn’t pay can’t really say If this is an expensive place to eat.

title: What a joke
text: Went for a coffee there today. Of course they wouldn’t sit us on a table so they offered the bar instead. What the heck we said let’s do it. Sat in the bar and waited 15 minutes (!!) for the bar woman to decide to take our order. Thanks but not thanks. I don’t care if the food is perfect, service is of equal importance. Hence the 1 Star.

title: Disappointed
text:
I have been flying on Blue Air for a number of years now this route almost on a monthly basis. This was the worse experience I ever had not inside the plane but with the ground staff. She quarreled not with one but with three passengers. When I pointed out this is not the way to talk to your customers, she picked up on me! I don’t care if she had her period, if she was right or wrong. You always talk politely to your customers who pay your salary. Period.
Will think twice next time I need to fly somewhere if I’m going to use this airline

title: Nice cozy healthy food
text: Nice, cozy, healthy food and good prices in the center of Nicosia. Really nice place for brunch or lunch. Will visit again

title: Not a five star
text:
Very good hotel but not a five star. Go to a Limassol our Paphos hotel and you will instantly see the difference.

Having said that, This is still a very good hotel. All areas including our room was clean and bright. We chose the sea view room overlooking the beach area which is one of the nicest in Cyprus. Having stayed in the room only for sleep this was probably a waste.

Breakfast was very good, great variety of foods and fresh juices.

Some of the staff was excellent (mainly the Asian ones) and some of them looked quite bored. Unacceptable in any hotel! If they have their period they better stay at home.

Unsurpassed of course is the beach. Perfect.

Will I return? Yes definitely.

title: Amazing
text: Probably the best chicken souvlaki in Cyprus. The food was excellent the service was quick and friendly and the prices really good! The fools was excellent and was served on papers on the table! I really liked this place despite the fact we ate here in December when most restaurants in ayia Napa and protaras were closed.

title: Beachfront restaurant
text: Nice restaurant very close to st Rafael hotel in Limassol. Great variety of food, some expensive some not so. Couple of times we’ve been to the restaurant it was quite full but the service was quick and efficient. The beachfront was so nice

title: Just love that castle
text: Everyone I’m in Paphos I love to visit the Paphos castle in the port. Excellent tourist attraction. Only thing that destroys the whole picture are all those cafes and restaurants in the small harbor that don’t really offer something of value.

title: Nice spot
text: Very good sushi in the recently renovated part of Paphos. Went on a Saturday night but thankfully it wasn’t packed . Nice music , liked the inside decor, food was great and service was quick. Prices not bad for Cyprus considering food is not cheap

title: Very good Souvlatzitiko
text: Very good Souvlatzitiko just opposite the Paphos mall. Good portions good prices but we had to wait a bit to bring our offer despite the fact that it’s wasn’t fully booked. Still a good place often visited by locals which is a plus

title: Excellent
text: Excellent resultant in the heart of Athens just a few meters away from syntagma sq. At the recommendation of my friend I tried the mastichato and indeed it was an excellent choice. Service was good despite the fact of being packed. Highly recommended

title: All time favorite hotel
text: My wife’s and mine all time favorite hotel. Feeling at home away from home. Being staying in this hotel every time we are in Pafos. We like the monastery design of the hotel. The location which is kind of secluded. Top service, excellent breakfast and of course very clean. Good value for money!

title: Simply the best
text: There is no way I’m in Paphos and not have dinner at least once at duomo restaurant. As always our food was excellent, top rated service. I just love their consistency!!!

title: Excellent hotel
text: Stayed for one night while attending a dinner party of my company. Room is v big and comfortable, bed one of the best I’ve ever stayed on. Everything crystal clean. Stuff very attentive and polite. Breakfast is simply so good. Will definitely stay there again.
place: Parklane, A Luxury Collection Resort & Spa

title: Excellent fish restaurant
text:
Everything was excellent during our Sunday visit of this fish restaurant.

The fish meze was excellent, waiters quick and polite, decor that best among all the Pixyda restaurants and of course the seafront. Process not bad for such a restaurant.

Will definitely visit again for another quality lunch or dinner!!

title: Quite good actually
text: The restaurant was quite good actually although we went there last Sunday and it was packed. The meze was really good, served with some delay since it was full. I particularly liked the fact that the meze did not include the usual huge variety of plates that inevitably is not consumed! Would eat there if I visit the village again

title: Indifferent
text: Nice restaurant on the beach. Probably you have to reserve a table on a Sunday for lunch. We didn’t so we were seated outside which was a bit windy. Food was ok although we had to order extras for our plain sea bass like rice or veggies. This i don’t like. Waiters were polite and served us well. Not a bad restaurant but on the other hand not one I would rush to go again soon.

title: Just perfect
text: You cannot be in Athens and not visit the Parthenon. Although thousand visit the Acropolis each day and getting in can be frustratingly slow, it is something that whoever is visiting Athens should visit at least once in their lifetime!!

title: Excellent business hotel
text: This is an excellent business hotel in the heart of Athens. Everything is within walking distance. It may not have the perfect room view as it is situated in Athens but the room was perfect and clean. In fact all the hotel facilities were very clean. Small pool for a swim. Bed very comfortable. Even the smallest detail such as providing a shaving razor. Breakfast was good served in a small terrace with nice view of the city. Last but not least the excellent staff, all of them very polite. Perfect choice for a centrally located small boutique hotel

title: Good lunch
text: Nice place near my office for some good lunch. The food is ok, service is ok and prices are good. Not a bad place to grab some lunch while in a hurry.

title: Not my style
text: This gourmet food not my style really. To be perfectly honest the food was pretty good, service was good and prices ok. badbad.

title: A must see
text: A must see when in Athens. Knowing a bit of Greek history would also help a little. A visit by night an absolute must.

title: Monumental
text: Absolute must visit when in Athens. Then you will understand why the Ancient Greek civilization gave so much to the world!

title: Hidden gem
text: Very nice establishment hidden from tourists. My spinach with rice was excellent, the rapid my colleague order was excellent as well. Nice decor inside and very good service. Prices very reasonable.Deserves a visit when in Athens.

title: Not bad
text: Not bad for a quick lunch. Serves mostly kebab which was not bad. Service was quick and efficient and polite as well.

title: Excellent
text: Excellent restaurant in the Athens city center. Large selection of Greek food, extremely professional staff that speaks English and good prices make this restaurant a good choice to visit

title: Nice!
text: Went for lunch today with 3 colleagues. The food was really good although they took around 30 minutes to serve us and despite the fact the restaurant wasn’t full. Still, I liked it. Staff very polite and reasonable prices. A definite go again

title: Wow!
text: Loved the idea of a restaurant within a market! Or a market within the restaurant. Great food, polite staff and nice decor. Prices not bad for such a place. Would definitely visit again

title: Excellent restaurant
text: This was an unplanned visit to the restaurant so no previous reservation was made. Possibly that was the reason that it took them about an hour after we arrived to serve us. Under normal circumstances that would be a very big minus. But the food was excellent and prices better than average! The selection of food is very big and possibly unsustainable so in order to keep the freshness and excellence of their plates they may have to cut a big part of their menu! Definitely we will be returning to this restaurant not just for their excellent food but also to check that the delay in serving us was a one off

title: Not bad
text: Not bad despite losing my luggage during my transit flight in Vienna. Bag arrived next evening to Copenhagen and delivered to my hotel. Other than that flight was ok

title: It suit my purpose perfectly
text: I was in Copenhagen for 3 days on a short business trip and this hotel suit my purpose perfectly. Quick check in although I did not use the computers to do that. Clean room and all other facilities. Bed comfortable. Room is small but what the heck I used it only to get a good night sleep. Hotel very close to Copenhagen central station. Breakfast was extra €16 per day but then everything is so expensive in Copenhagen. Also drinking water I had to buy. Overall perfectly satisfied with my staying.
